headline: Assessing Dow (DOW) Valuation After A Sharp Rebound And Conflicting Cash Flow Signals
summary: Why Dow stock is on investors’ radar today Dow (DOW) is back in focus after a recent move that left the shares up about 16% over the past month and roughly 14% over the past 3 months, inviting closer attention from income and value oriented investors. See our latest analysis for Dow. Despite the recent 30 day share price return of about 15.5% and a 90 day share price return near 13.9%, the 1 year total shareholder return of around a 24.3% decline and 3 year total shareholder return of roughly...
